title: Cookie Policy
description: This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar tracking technologies on our website and mobile application (collectively referred to as the "App").
description1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website or use a mobile application. They enable the website or app to remember your actions and preferences over time.
description2: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies for the following purposes:
description3: These cookies are necessary for the operation of the App and to provide basic functionalities.
description4: These cookies help us analyze how users interact with the App, allowing us to improve its performance and user experience.
description5: These cookies enable certain features of the App, such as personalization and language preferences.
description6: We may use third-party advertising cookies to display personalized ads based on your browsing behavior.
description7: You have the option to accept or decline cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can usually modify your browser settings to decline cookies if you prefer. However, this may prevent you from accessing certain features of the App.
description8: We may allow third-party service providers to place cookies on the App to provide us with analytics and advertising services. These cookies are subject to the respective privacy policies of these third parties.
description9: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any updates.
description10: If you have any questions or concerns about our use of cookies, please contact us through the information provided on our contacts page.
